sys_ui_macro.name: edit_snapshot
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	
	<input type="button" onclick="recalcSnapshot(g_form.getUniqueValue())" style="background-color:DodgerBlue; color:white" value="Recalculate snapshot" class="selected_action action_context btn btn-primary"/>
	
	
<script>
	function recalcSnapshot(id){
	
	var loadingDialog = new GlideDialogWindow("global.dialog_loading", true);
	loadingDialog.setPreference('table', 'loading');
	<!-- loadingDialog.setSize(750,300); -->
	loadingDialog.setTitle('Calculating snapshot ...');
	loadingDialog.render();
	
	var gaSnapshot = new GlideAjax('SLSIncidentSnapshotUtilsClient');
	gaSnapshot.addParam('sysparm_name','recalculateSnapshot');
	gaSnapshot.addParam('incSysID', id);
	gaSnapshot.getXMLWait();
	var res = gaSnapshot.getAnswer();
	//alert(res);
		
	
	setTimeout(function() {
		loadingDialog.destroy();
	}, 3000);
	
	}
	
	
</script>
	
</j:jelly>
